meanings.definition: Of or relating to the upper regions of the atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The aetheric clouds floated high above the earth.
meanings.sent2: The pilot marveled at the aetheric beauty of the sky.
meanings.sent3: The aetheric mist made the sky look like a painting.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared through aetheric realms of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The aetheric glow of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.

meanings.definition: A substance believed to fill the region of the universe above the terrestrial sphere.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of aetheric beings dwelling in the heavens.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the properties of the mysterious aetheric substance.
meanings.sent3: The children imagined riding on aetheric clouds like magic carpets.
meanings.sent4: The aetheric essence of the stars whispered secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut gazed at the aetheric expanse beyond the Earth, feeling small yet connected.
